com.jivesoftware.selenium.pagefactory.framework.actions

Class BaseSeleniumActions<B extends Browser>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jivesoftware.selenium.pagefactory.framework.actions.BaseSeleniumActions<B>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SeleniumActions
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndroidSeleniumActions, ChromeSeleniumActions, FirefoxSeleniumActions, InternetExplorerActions, IOSSeleniumActions

    public abstract class BaseSeleniumActions<B extends Browser>
extends Object
implements SeleniumActions
    Default implementations of Selenium actions that aren't browser-specific.

      • findElementContainingChild

        public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement findElementContainingChild(org.openqa.selenium.By parentLocator,
                                                        org.openqa.selenium.By childLocator)
        Description copied from interface: SeleniumActions
        Find the first element located by 'parentLocator' that has at least 1 child element located by the relative locator 'childLocator'
        Specified by:
        findElementContainingChild in interface SeleniumActions
        Parameters:
        parentLocator - - locator to find parent elements
        childLocator - - relative locator to find child elements inside a parent element
        Returns:
        - parent element that have at least 1 child element located by 'childLocator', or null if there are none.

      • enterTextForAutoCompleteAndSelectFirstMatch

        public void enterTextForAutoCompleteAndSelectFirstMatch(org.openqa.selenium.By inputLocator,
                                               String text,
                                               org.openqa.selenium.By popoverLocator,
                                               String requiredPopupText)
        Description copied from interface: SeleniumActions
        Enter the given text into the input defined by inputCSS, one character at a time. At each step, verify the previous popup was removed from the DOM, and find the new popup. Then see if there is a popup containing the required text on the page. If so, click it and return.
        Specified by:
        enterTextForAutoCompleteAndSelectFirstMatch in interface SeleniumActions
        Parameters:
        inputLocator - - locator for the input element
        text - - text you are entering into the input element
        popoverLocator - - locator for the popup element containing required text, or list element if there multiple
        requiredPopupText - - text required to be present in popup element defined by popupItemCss

      • enterTextForAutoCompleteAndSelectFirstMatch

                                               int minChars,

                                               String requiredPopupText)
        Description copied from interface: SeleniumActions

        Specified by:
        enterTextForAutoCompleteAndSelectFirstMatch in interface SeleniumActions

      • findElements

        protected List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> findElements(org.openqa.selenium.By locator,
                                                org.openqa.selenium.WebElement parentEl)
        Convenient helper to Find Elements from either top page element or from parent element.
        Parameters:
        locator - - Locator defining the input element
        parentEl - - Parent web element. If this is provided the search will be from the parent element. If null, search will be from top element
